Question: Shenzhen F&C Tech Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen F&C Tech Co., Ltd.

Product: Unveiled latest consumer electronic products and innovative technologies at CES 2024, including AI, AR/VR, digital medicine, robotics, smart city, smart home, space technology, vehicle technology, and Web3. Displayed advanced imaging solutions, laser display technology, and LiDAR technology. Showcased car-integrated and home appliances, integrating projection curtain, ALPD 5.0 super full-color laser technology, and other innovations. Exhibited generative AI integration for smart lighting to create specific moods. Featured electric vehicles, including a new "flying car." Notable presence of Chinese tech giants Alibaba and ByteDance. AI, smart homes, green tech, and electric vehicles were highlighted trends. Notable exhibitors included Govee, Rockchip, Black Sesame, and XPeng.
